properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, USER_NO, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, USER_NO, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE ROWNUM <= 3 AND TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE) > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1,'YYYYMMDDHH') AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND DESC
INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL , 1 , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT(FILE_NO , REF_BNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_RECOMMEND, USER_NO, BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL
